channel.title: What game server should I host?
channel.description:
We will run this as a topic to get suggestions, then I'll change it into a poll so we can vote for our favorites.
It must run on a modern 64-bit Linux distribution. 32-bit binaries will run as well, though I would obviously prefer something with source code. Cross-platform clients are also a plus. (so I can play it from Linux)
On IRC people have already suggested the following:
[ol][li][url=http://www.alientrap.org/nexuiz/]Nexuiz[/url][/li] [li]Enemy Territory: Quake Wars[/li] [li]Doom 2 ([url=http://www.zdaemon.org/]zdaemon[/url])[/li] [li][url=http://tremulous.net/]Tremulous[/url][/li] [li]Red Faction[/li] [li]Battlefield 1942[/li] [li]Call of Duty 2[/li] [li]Doom 3[/li] [li]Quake 4[/li] [li][url=http://springrts.com/]Spring RTS[/url][/li] [li]Counter Strike: Source (with mods)[/li][/ol]

item.title: What game server should I host?
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

[quote=“MujaheD, post:95, topic:315203”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=411626.msg3148111#msg3148111 date=1268270423]

Can’t you put Call of duty 4? I have it on my computer and it 0wnz!

That games ownz…yes,But I finished it in a week…

I don’t think I’d ever host that game, I’ve played it at a few LAN parties and just completely hate it. Sorry.
[/quote]
LAN parties? Sounds like FUN!

Oh and this topic is almost a year old. Do you still plan on hosting a game server?[/quote]

Can’t you put Call of duty 4? I have it on my computer and it 0wnz!

I don’t think I’d ever host that game, I’ve played it at a few LAN parties and just completely hate it. Sorry.
[/quote]
LAN parties? Sounds like FUN!

Oh and this topic is almost a year old. Do you still plan on hosting a game server?[/quote]

Sure he does, just look at the design the homepage thread - Everyone made a design, the best one got voted in and he just installed wordpress instead.

If this is anything to go by, you’ll all be playing a maple story private server.
